titleStmt.title: A healing question propounded and resolved upon occasion of the late publique and seasonable call to humiliation in order to love and union amongst the honest party, and with a desire to apply balsome to the wound, before it become incurable.
titleStmt.author: Vane, Henry, Sir, 1612?-1662.

notesStmt.note: Other editions have the author's name on t.p.
"Recommends the adoption of a new constitution in place of the one which the army had imposed on the nation"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
